name: Desdemona
description:
Desdemona is based on going to a haunted house with your friends and defeating the demon which huanted the house. You need to find multiple objects to weaken the demon, you can also summon the demon with a ritual.The main point of the game is breaking the curse from the house and killing the ghost who wants to kill you.

--HORROR/STRATEGY--
-Game is based on a horror theme.Get your team and face with the ghost's magic.
-TEAMWORK is the key of the winning the game!
-Clean cursed objects and kill the ghost!

--SURVIVE--
-don't do anything to piss the ghost.
-Make teamwork with your friends.
